description: Allows an application to replace the app name displayed alongside notifications in the N-release and later.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.SUBSTITUTE_NOTIFICATION_APP_NAME

description: Allows an application to whitelist tasks during lock task mode Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.UPDATE_LOCK_TASK_PACKAGES

description: Required to make calls to android.service.vr.IVrManager
name: android.permission.ACCESS_VR_MANAGER

description: Must be required by an android.service.vr.VrListenerServic, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.  Protection level: signature
name: android.permission.BIND_VR_LISTENER_SERVICE

description: Allows the holder to write blocked numbers. See android.provider.BlockedNumberContract
name: android.permission.WRITE_BLOCKED_NUMBERS

description: Allows the holder to read blocked numbers. See android.provider.BlockedNumberContract
name: android.permission.READ_BLOCKED_NUMBERS

description: Allows trusted applications to dispatch managed provisioning message to Managed Provisioning app. If requesting app does not have permission, it will be ignored.
name: android.permission.DISPATCH_PROVISIONING_MESSAGE

description: Must be required by system/priv apps when accessing the sound trigger APIs given by SoundTriggerManager  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.MANAGE_SOUND_TRIGGER

description: Allows receiving the usage of media resource e.g. video/audio codec and graphic memory.
name: android.permission.RECEIVE_MEDIA_RESOURCE_USAGE

description: Allows the holder to access the ephemeral applications on the device.
name: android.permission.ACCESS_EPHEMERAL_APPS

description: Allows changing day / night mode when system is configured with config_lockDayNightMode set to true. If requesting app does not have permission, it will be ignored.
name: android.permission.MODIFY_DAY_NIGHT_MODE

description: Allows the Nfc stack to dispatch Nfc messages to applications. Applications can use this permission to ensure incoming Nfc messages are from the Nfc stack and not simulated by another application.
name: android.permission.DISPATCH_NFC_MESSAGE

description: Allows access to MAC addresses of WiFi and Bluetooth peer devices.
name: android.permission.PEERS_MAC_ADDRESS

description: Allows applications to read the local WiFi and Bluetooth MAC address.
name: android.permission.LOCAL_MAC_ADDRESS

description: Allows applications to kill UIDs.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.KILL_UID

description: Allows an application to query whether DO_NOT_ASK_CREDENTIALS_ON_BOOT flag is set.
name: android.permission.QUERY_DO_NOT_ASK_CREDENTIALS_ON_BOOT

description: The system process that is allowed to bind to services in carrier apps will have this permission. Carrier apps should use this permission to protect their services that only the system is allowed to bind to.  Protection level: system signature
name: android.permission.BIND_CARRIER_SERVICES

description: Allows an application to interact with the currently active android.service.voice.VoiceInteractionService
name: android.permission.ACCESS_VOICE_INTERACTION_SERVICE

description: Use BIND_CARRIER_SERVICES instead
name: android.permission.BIND_CARRIER_MESSAGING_SERVICE

description: Allows an application to remove DRM certificates This is not a third-party API (intended for system apps).
name: android.permission.REMOVE_DRM_CERTIFICATES

description: Allows an application to read install sessions This is not a third-party API (intended for system apps).
name: android.permission.READ_INSTALL_SESSIONS

description: Api Allows an application to manage media projection sessions.  This is not a third-party API (intended for system apps).
name: android.permission.MANAGE_MEDIA_PROJECTION

description: Allows an application to provision and access DRM certificates This is not a third-party API (intended for system apps).
name: android.permission.ACCESS_DRM_CERTIFICATES

description: Allows an application to listen for network condition observations.  This is not a third-party API (intended for system apps).
name: android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_CONDITIONS

description: Allows an application to call into a carrier setup flow. It is up to the carrier setup application to enforce that this permission is required This is not a third-party API (intended for OEMs and system apps).
name: android.permission.INVOKE_CARRIER_SETUP

description: Must be required by an android.service.dreams.DreamServic, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.  Protection level: signature
name: android.permission.BIND_DREAM_SERVICE

description: Must be required by a android.service.notification.ConditionProviderServic, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.  Protection level: signature
name: android.permission.BIND_CONDITION_PROVIDER_SERVICE

description: Must be required by an android.service.notification.NotificationRankerService         to ensure that only the system can bind to it.  Protection level: signature This is not a third-party API (intended for system apps).
name: android.permission.BIND_CHOOSER_TARGET_SERVICE

description: Must be required by an android.service.notification.NotificationListenerServic, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.  Protection level: signature
name: android.permission.BIND_NOTIFICATION_LISTENER_SERVICE

description: Must be required by an android.service.trust.TrustAgentServic, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.
name: android.permission.BIND_TRUST_AGENT

description: Allows an application to launch the trust agent settings activity.
name: android.permission.LAUNCH_TRUST_AGENT_SETTINGS

description: Allows an application to provide a trust agent.  For security reasons, this is a platform-only permission.
name: android.permission.PROVIDE_TRUST_AGENT

description: Allows an application to listen to trust changes.  Only allowed for system processes.
name: android.permission.TRUST_LISTENER

description: Allows an application to control keyguard.  Only allowed for system processes.
name: android.permission.CONTROL_KEYGUARD

description: Allows an app to reset fingerprint attempt counter. Reserved for the system.
name: android.permission.RESET_FINGERPRINT_LOCKOUT

description: Allows managing (adding, removing) fingerprint templates. Reserved for the system.
name: android.permission.MANAGE_FINGERPRINT

description: Allows access to keyguard secure storage.  Only allowed for system processes.
name: android.permission.ACCESS_KEYGUARD_SECURE_STORAGE

description: Allows modification of do not disturb rules and policies. Only allowed for system processes.
name: android.permission.MANAGE_NOTIFICATIONS

description: Marker permission for applications that wish to access notification policy.  Protection level: normal
name: android.permission.ACCESS_NOTIFICATION_POLICY

description: Allows an application to read the current set of notifications, including any metadata and intents attached.
name: android.permission.ACCESS_NOTIFICATIONS

description: Allows an application to hold an UpdateLock, recommending that a headless OTA reboot *not* occur while the lock is held.
name: android.permission.UPDATE_LOCK

description: Allows the holder to access content providers from outside an ApplicationThread.  This permission is enforced by the ActivityManagerService on the corresponding APIs, in particular ActivityManagerService#getContentProviderExternal(String) and ActivityManagerService#removeContentProviderExternal(String).
name: android.permission.ACCESS_CONTENT_PROVIDERS_EXTERNALLY

description: Allows applications to access serial ports via the SerialManager.
name: android.permission.SERIAL_PORT

description: Must be required by intent filter verifier receiver, to ensure that only the system can interact with it.
name: android.permission.BIND_INTENT_FILTER_VERIFIER

description: Intent filter verifier needs to have this permission before the PackageManager will trust it to verify intent filters.
name: android.permission.INTENT_FILTER_VERIFICATION_AGENT

description: Must be required by package verifier receiver, to ensure that only the system can interact with it.
name: android.permission.BIND_PACKAGE_VERIFIER

description: Package verifier needs to have this permission before the PackageManager will trust it to verify packages.
name: android.permission.PACKAGE_VERIFICATION_AGENT

description: C2DM permission.  Used internally.
name: android.intent.category.MASTER_CLEAR.permission.C2D_MESSAGE

description: Allows an application to account its network traffic against other UIDs. Used by system services like download manager and media server. Not for use by third party apps.
name: android.permission.MODIFY_NETWORK_ACCOUNTING

description: Allows an application to manage network policies (such as warning and disable limits) and to define application-specific rules.
name: android.permission.MANAGE_NETWORK_POLICY

description: Allows an application to read historical network usage for specific networks and applications.
name: android.permission.READ_NETWORK_USAGE_HISTORY

description: Internal permission protecting access to the encryption methods
name: android.permission.CRYPT_KEEPER

description: Must be required by default container service so that only the system can bind to it and use it to copy protected data to secure containers or files accessible to the system.
name: android.permission.COPY_PROTECTED_DATA

description: Allow an application to read and write the cache partition.
name: android.permission.ACCESS_CACHE_FILESYSTEM

description: Allows applications to write dream settings, and start or stop dreaming.
name: android.permission.WRITE_DREAM_STATE

description: Allows applications to read dream settings and dream state.
name: android.permission.READ_DREAM_STATE

description: Allows applications to set a live wallpaper.  XXX Change to signature once the picker is moved to its own apk as Ghod Intended.
name: android.permission.SET_WALLPAPER_COMPONENT

description: Internal permission to allows an application to read indexable data.
name: android.permission.READ_SEARCH_INDEXABLES

description: Internal permission protecting access to the global search system: ensures that only the system can access the provider to perform queries (since this otherwise provides unrestricted access to a variety of content providers), and to write the search statistics (to keep applications from gaming the source ranking).
name: android.permission.GLOBAL_SEARCH_CONTROL

description: This permission can be used on content providers to allow the global search system to access their data.  Typically it used when the provider has some permissions protecting it (which global search would not be expected to hold), and added as a read-only permission to the path in the provider where global search queries are performed.  This permission can not be held by regular applications; it is used by applications to protect themselves from everyone else besides global search.
name: android.permission.GLOBAL_SEARCH

description: Allows applications to change the background data setting.  Not for use by third-party applications.  pending API council
name: android.permission.CHANGE_BACKGROUND_DATA_SETTING

description: Internal permission allowing an application to query/set which applications can bind AppWidgets.
name: android.permission.MODIFY_APPWIDGET_BIND_PERMISSIONS

description: Private permission, to restrict who can bring up a dialog to add a new keyguard widget
name: android.permission.BIND_KEYGUARD_APPWIDGET

description: Allows an application to tell the AppWidget service which application can access AppWidget's data.  The normal user flow is that a user picks an AppWidget to go into a particular host, thereby giving that host application access to the private data from the AppWidget app.  An application that has this permission should honor that contract.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.BIND_APPWIDGET

description: Must be required by a android.widget.RemoteViewsServic, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.
name: android.permission.BIND_REMOTEVIEWS

description: Allows a package to launch the secure full-backup confirmation UI.  ONLY the system process may hold this permission.
name: android.permission.CONFIRM_FULL_BACKUP

description: Allows an application to control the backup and restore process.  Not for use by third-party applications.  pending API council
name: android.permission.BACKUP

description: Allows an application to collect battery statistics
name: android.permission.BATTERY_STATS

description: Permission an application must hold in order to use ACTION_REQUEST_IGNORE_BATTERY_OPTIMIZATIONS.  This is a normal permission: an app requesting it will always be granted the permission, without the user needing to approve or see it.
name: android.permission.REQUEST_IGNORE_BATTERY_OPTIMIZATIONS

description: Allows an application to temporarily whitelist an inactive app to access the network and acquire wakelocks.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.CHANGE_DEVICE_IDLE_TEMP_WHITELIST

description: Allows an application to change the app idle state of an app.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.CHANGE_APP_IDLE_STATE

description: Allows an application to collect component usage statistics Declaring the permission implies intention to use the API and the user of the device can grant permission through the Settings application.
name: android.permission.PACKAGE_USAGE_STATS

description: Allows read/write access to the 'properties' table in the checkin database, to change values that get uploaded.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.ACCESS_CHECKIN_PROPERTIES

description: Allows enabling/disabling location update notifications from the radio.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.CONTROL_LOCATION_UPDATES

description: Allows an application to perform SIM Activation
name: android.permission.PERFORM_SIM_ACTIVATION

description: Allows an application to perform CDMA OTA provisioning
name: android.permission.PERFORM_CDMA_PROVISIONING

description: Allows an application to call any phone number, including emergency numbers, without going through the Dialer user interface for the user to confirm the call being placed.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.CALL_PRIVILEGED

description: Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.MASTER_CLEAR

description: Allows an application to broadcast privileged networking requests.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.BROADCAST_NETWORK_PRIVILEGED

description: Allows an application to broadcast a WAP PUSH receipt notification.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.BROADCAST_WAP_PUSH

description: Allows an application to broadcast an SMS receipt notification.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.BROADCAST_SMS

description: Allows an application to broadcast a notification that an application package has been removed.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.BROADCAST_PACKAGE_REMOVED

description: Run as a manufacturer test application, running as the root user.  Only available when the device is running in manufacturer test mode.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.FACTORY_TEST

description: Allows low-level access to tun tap driver
name: android.permission.NET_TUNNELING

description: Allows access to the PowerManager.userActivity function.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.USER_ACTIVITY

description: Allows low-level access to power management.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.DEVICE_POWER

description: Required to be able to reboot the device.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.REBOOT

description: Required to be able to disable the device (very dangerous!).  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.BRICK

description: Allows an application to know what content is playing and control its playback.  Not for use by third-party applications due to privacy of media consumption
name: android.permission.MEDIA_CONTENT_CONTROL

description: Allows an application to capture secure video output.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.CAPTURE_SECURE_VIDEO_OUTPUT

description: Allows an application to capture video output.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.CAPTURE_VIDEO_OUTPUT

description: Allows an application to modify audio routing and override policy decisions.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.MODIFY_AUDIO_ROUTING

description: Allows an application to capture audio for hotword detection.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.CAPTURE_AUDIO_HOTWORD

description: Allows an application to capture audio output.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.CAPTURE_AUDIO_OUTPUT

description: Allows an application to control VPN.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.CONTROL_VPN

description: Allows an application to control the color modes set for displays system-wide.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.CONFIGURE_DISPLAY_COLOR_MODE

description: Allows an application to control low-level features of Wifi displays such as opening an RTSP socket.  This permission should only be used by the display manager.
name: android.permission.CONTROL_WIFI_DISPLAY

description: Allows an application to configure and connect to Wifi displays
name: android.permission.CONFIGURE_WIFI_DISPLAY

description: Allows an application to use InputFlinger's low level features.
name: android.permission.ACCESS_INPUT_FLINGER

description: Allows an application to take screen shots and more generally get access to the frame buffer data.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.READ_FRAME_BUFFER

description: Allows an application to use SurfaceFlinger's low level features.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.ACCESS_SURFACE_FLINGER

description: Allows an application to observe permission changes.
name: android.permission.OBSERVE_GRANT_REVOKE_PERMISSIONS

description: Allows an application to revoke specific permissions.
name: android.permission.REVOKE_RUNTIME_PERMISSIONS

description: Allows an app that has this permission and the permissions to install packages to request certain runtime permissions to be granted at installation.
name: android.permission.INSTALL_GRANT_RUNTIME_PERMISSIONS

description: Allows an application to grant specific permissions.
name: android.permission.GRANT_RUNTIME_PERMISSIONS

description: Allows an application to change whether an application component (other than its own) is enabled or not.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.CHANGE_COMPONENT_ENABLED_STATE

description: Allows an application to move location of installed package.
name: android.permission.MOVE_PACKAGE

description: Allows an application to delete packages.  Not for use by third-party applications.  Starting in N, user confirmation is requested when the application deleting the package is not the same application that installed the package.
name: android.permission.DELETE_PACKAGES

description: Allows an application to delete cache files.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.DELETE_CACHE_FILES

description: Allows an application to get the URI permissions granted to another application.  Not for use by third-party applications
name: android.permission.GET_APP_GRANTED_URI_PERMISSIONS

description: Allows an application to clear user data.  Not for use by third-party applications
name: android.permission.CLEAR_APP_USER_DATA

description: Allows an application to install packages.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.INSTALL_PACKAGES

description: Allows an application to request installing packages. Apps targeting APIs greater than 22 must hold this permission in order to use ACTION_INSTALL_PACKAGE.  Protection level: normal
name: android.permission.REQUEST_INSTALL_PACKAGES

description: Allows an application to query tablet mode state and monitor changes in it.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.TABLET_MODE

description: Allows low-level access to setting the keyboard layout.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.SET_KEYBOARD_LAYOUT

description: Allows low-level access to setting input device calibration.  Not for use by normal applications.
name: android.permission.SET_INPUT_CALIBRATION

description: Allows low-level access to setting the pointer speed.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.SET_POINTER_SPEED

description: Allows low-level access to setting the orientation (actually rotation) of the screen.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.SET_ORIENTATION

description: Required to add or remove another application as a device admin.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.MANAGE_DEVICE_ADMINS

description: Must be required by device administration receiver, to ensure that only the system can interact with it.  Protection level: signature
name: android.permission.BIND_DEVICE_ADMIN

description: Must be required by a android.media.routing.MediaRouteServiceto ensure that only the system can interact with it.
name: android.permission.BIND_ROUTE_PROVIDER

description: Allows an application to modify parental controls Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.MODIFY_PARENTAL_CONTROLS

description: Must be required for a virtual remote controller for TV.  Protection level: signature privileged Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.TV_VIRTUAL_REMOTE_CONTROLLER

description: Must be required by a com.android.media.tv.remoteprovider.TvRemoteProviderto ensure that only the system can bind to it.  Protection level: signature privileged Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.BIND_TV_REMOTE_SERVICE

description: Must be required by a android.media.tv.TvInputServiceto ensure that only the system can bind to it.  Protection level: signature
name: android.permission.BIND_TV_INPUT

description: Must be required by a com.android.media.remotedisplay.RemoteDisplayProvide, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.
name: android.permission.BIND_REMOTE_DISPLAY

description: Must be required by hotword enrollment application, to ensure that only the system can interact with it.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.MANAGE_VOICE_KEYPHRASES

description: Must be required by a android.service.voice.VoiceInteractionServic, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.  Protection level: signature
name: android.permission.BIND_VOICE_INTERACTION

description: Must be required by a android.service.wallpaper.WallpaperServic, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.  Protection level: system signature
name: android.permission.BIND_WALLPAPER

description: Must be required by a android.net.VpnServic, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.  Protection level: signature
name: android.permission.BIND_VPN_SERVICE

description: Must be required by a TextService (e.g. SpellCheckerService) to ensure that only the system can bind to it.  Protection level: signature
name: android.permission.BIND_TEXT_SERVICE

description: Must be required by the RuntimePermissionPresenterService to ensure that only the system can bind to it.
name: android.permission.BIND_RUNTIME_PERMISSION_PRESENTER_SERVICE

description: Must be required by the PrintSpooler to ensure that only the system can bind to it.
name: android.permission.BIND_PRINT_SPOOLER_SERVICE

description: Must be required by a android.nfc.cardemulation.HostApduServiceor android.nfc.cardemulation.OffHostApduServiceto ensure that only the system can bind to it.  Protection level: signature
name: android.permission.BIND_NFC_SERVICE

description: Must be required by a android.printservice.recommendation.RecommendationServic, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.  Protection level: signature
name: android.permission.BIND_PRINT_RECOMMENDATION_SERVICE

description: Must be required by a android.printservice.PrintServic, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.  Protection level: signature
name: android.permission.BIND_PRINT_SERVICE

description: Must be required by an android.accessibilityservice.AccessibilityServic, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.  Protection level: signature
name: android.permission.BIND_ACCESSIBILITY_SERVICE

description: Must be required by an android.media.midi.MidiDeviceServic, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.  Protection level: signature
name: android.permission.BIND_MIDI_DEVICE_SERVICE

description: Must be required by an android.inputmethodservice.InputMethodServic, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.  Protection level: signature
name: android.permission.BIND_INPUT_METHOD

description: Allows an application to retrieve the current state of keys and switches.  Not for use by third-party applications.  The API that used this permission has been removed.
name: android.permission.READ_INPUT_STATE

description: Allows an application to retrieve private information about the current top activity, such as any assist context it can provide.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.GET_TOP_ACTIVITY_INFO

description: Allows an application to tell the activity manager to temporarily stop application switches, putting it into a special mode that prevents applications from immediately switching away from some critical UI such as the home screen.
name: android.permission.STOP_APP_SWITCHES

description: Allows an application to call the activity manager shutdown() API to put the higher-level system there into a shutdown state.
name: android.permission.SHUTDOWN

description: Allows an application to watch and control how activities are started globally in the system.  Only for is in debugging (usually the monkey command).  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.SET_ACTIVITY_WATCHER

description: Allows an application to temporary enable accessibility on the device.
name: android.permission.TEMPORARY_ENABLE_ACCESSIBILITY

description: Allows an application to collect frame statistics
name: android.permission.FRAME_STATS

description: Allows an application to retrieve the window token from the accessibility manager.
name: android.permission.RETRIEVE_WINDOW_TOKEN

description: Allows an application to register an input filter which filters the stream of user events (keys, touch, trackball) before they are dispatched to any window.
name: android.permission.FILTER_EVENTS

description: Allows an application to inject user events (keys, touch, trackball) into the event stream and deliver them to ANY window.  Without this permission, you can only deliver events to windows in your own process.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.INJECT_EVENTS

description: Allows the application to temporarily freeze the screen for a full-screen transition.
name: android.permission.FREEZE_SCREEN

description: Allows System UI to register listeners for events from Window Manager.
name: android.permission.REGISTER_WINDOW_MANAGER_LISTENERS

description: Allows an application to manage (create, destroy, Z-order) application tokens in the window manager.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.MANAGE_APP_TOKENS

description: Allows an application to open windows that are for use by parts of the system user interface.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.INTERNAL_SYSTEM_WINDOW

description: Allows an application to update the user app op restrictions.  Not for use by third party apps.
name: android.permission.MANAGE_APP_OPS_RESTRICTIONS

description: Allows an application to update application operation statistics. Not for use by third party apps.
name: android.permission.UPDATE_APP_OPS_STATS

description: Allows an application to collect battery statistics
name: android.permission.GET_APP_OPS_STATS

description: Allows an application to update device statistics.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.UPDATE_DEVICE_STATS

description: Allows an application to force a BACK operation on whatever is the top activity.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.FORCE_BACK

description: Allows an application to bind to third party quick settings tiles.  Should only be requested by the System, should be required by TileService declarations.
name: android.permission.BIND_QUICK_SETTINGS_TILE

description: Allows an application to be the status bar.  Currently used only by SystemUI.apk
name: android.permission.STATUS_BAR_SERVICE

description: Allows an application to open, close, or disable the status bar and its icons.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.STATUS_BAR

description: Allows applications to RW to diagnostic resources.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.DIAGNOSTIC

description: Allows but does not guarantee access to user passwords at the conclusion of add account
name: android.permission.GET_PASSWORD

description: Allows access to the list of accounts in the Accounts Service.
name: android.permission.GET_ACCOUNTS_PRIVILEGED

description: Allow an application to request that a signal be sent to all persistent processes.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.SIGNAL_PERSISTENT_PROCESSES

description: Allows an application to control whether activities are immediately finished when put in the background.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.SET_ALWAYS_FINISH

description: Allows an application to set the maximum number of (not needed) application processes that can be running.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.SET_PROCESS_LIMIT

description: Configure an application for debugging.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.SET_DEBUG_APP

description: Allows an application to read the low-level system log files.  Not for use by third-party applications, because Log entries can contain the user's private information.
name: android.permission.READ_LOGS

description: Allows an application to retrieve state dump information from system services.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.DUMP

description: Allows an application to read or write the secure system settings.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS

description: Allows the system to reset throttling in shortcut manager.
name: android.permission.RESET_SHORTCUT_MANAGER_THROTTLING

description: Allows an application to initiate configuration updates An application requesting this permission is responsible for verifying the source and integrity of any update before passing it off to the various individual installer components
name: android.permission.UPDATE_CONFIG

description: Allows the system to bind to an application's task services
name: android.permission.BIND_JOB_SERVICE

description: Allows an application to do certain operations needed for interacting with the recovery (system update) system.
name: android.permission.RECOVERY

description: Allows an application to install and/or uninstall CA certificates on behalf of the user.
name: android.permission.MANAGE_CA_CERTIFICATES

description: Allows an application to use any media decoder when decoding for playback
name: android.permission.ALLOW_ANY_CODEC_FOR_PLAYBACK

description: Allows an application to clear the caches of all installed applications on the device.  Protection level: system signature
name: android.permission.CLEAR_APP_CACHE

description: Allows applications to change network connectivity state.  Protection level: normal
name: android.permission.CHANGE_NETWORK_STATE

description: Allows applications to write the apn settings.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.WRITE_APN_SETTINGS

description: Allows rename of ASEC volumes
name: android.permission.ASEC_RENAME

description: Allows mount / unmount of ASEC volumes
name: android.permission.ASEC_MOUNT_UNMOUNT

description: Allows destruction of ASEC volumes
name: android.permission.ASEC_DESTROY

description: Allows creation of ASEC volumes
name: android.permission.ASEC_CREATE

description: Allows access to ASEC non-destructive API calls
name: android.permission.ASEC_ACCESS

description: Allows formatting file systems for removable storage.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.MOUNT_FORMAT_FILESYSTEMS

description: Allows mounting and unmounting file systems for removable storage.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.MOUNT_UNMOUNT_FILESYSTEMS

description: Allows an application to broadcast sticky intents.  These are broadcasts whose data is held by the system after being finished, so that clients can quickly retrieve that data without having to wait for the next broadcast.  Protection level: normal
name: android.permission.BROADCAST_STICKY

description: Allows an application to receive the ACTION_BOOT_COMPLETED that is broadcast after the system finishes booting.  If you don't request this permission, you will not receive the broadcast at that time.  Though holding this permission does not have any security implications, it can have a negative impact on the user experience by increasing the amount of time it takes the system to start and allowing applications to have themselves running without the user being aware of them.  As such, you must explicitly declare your use of this facility to make that visible to the user.  Protection level: normal
name: android.permission.RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETED

description: No longer useful, see addPackageToPreferred for details.
name: android.permission.SET_PREFERRED_APPLICATIONS

description: Allows an application to find out the space used by any package.  Protection level: normal
name: android.permission.GET_PACKAGE_SIZE

description: This functionality will be removed in the future; please do not use. Allow an application to make its activities persistent.
name: android.permission.PERSISTENT_ACTIVITY

description: Modify the global animation scaling factor.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.SET_ANIMATION_SCALE

description: Allows an application to retrieve the content of the active window An active window is the window that has fired an accessibility event.
name: android.permission.RETRIEVE_WINDOW_CONTENT

description: Allows an application to call forceStopPackage.
name: android.permission.FORCE_STOP_PACKAGES

description: Allows an application to modify the Google service map.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.WRITE_GSERVICES

description: Allows an application to read or write the system settings.  Note: If the app targets API level 23 or higher, the app user must explicitly grant this permission to the app through a permission management screen.  The app requests the user's approval by sending an intent with action ACTION_MANAGE_WRITE_SETTINGS. The app can check whether it has this authorization by calling android.provider.Settings.System#canWrite Settings.System.canWrite()  Protection level: signature
name: android.permission.WRITE_SETTINGS

description: Allows an application to modify the current configuration, such as locale.
name: android.permission.CHANGE_CONFIGURATION

description: Change the screen compatibility mode of applications
name: android.permission.SET_SCREEN_COMPATIBILITY

description: Allows applications to read the sync stats.  Protection level: normal
name: android.permission.READ_SYNC_STATS

description: Allows applications to write the sync settings.  Protection level: normal
name: android.permission.WRITE_SYNC_SETTINGS

description: Allows applications to read the sync settings.  Protection level: normal
name: android.permission.READ_SYNC_SETTINGS

description: Allows an application to uninstall a shortcut in Launcher.  Protection level: normal
name: com.android.launcher.permission.UNINSTALL_SHORTCUT

description: Allows an application to install a shortcut in Launcher.  Protection level: normal
name: com.android.launcher.permission.INSTALL_SHORTCUT

description: Allows an application to expand or collapse the status bar.  Protection level: normal
name: android.permission.EXPAND_STATUS_BAR

description: Allows applications to set the system time zone.  Protection level: normal
name: android.permission.SET_TIME_ZONE

description: Allows applications to set the system time.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.SET_TIME

description: Allows applications to set the wallpaper hints.  Protection level: normal
name: android.permission.SET_WALLPAPER_HINTS

description: Allows applications to set the wallpaper.  Protection level: normal
name: android.permission.SET_WALLPAPER

description: Allows an app to create windows using the type TYPE_SYSTEM_ALERT, shown on top of all other apps.  Very few apps should use this permission; these windows are intended for system-level interaction with the user.  Note: If the app targets API level 23 or higher, the app user must explicitly grant this permission to the app through a permission management screen. The app requests the user's approval by sending an intent with action ACTION_MANAGE_OVERLAY_PERMISSION.  The app can check whether it has this authorization by calling android.provider.Settings#canDrawOverlays Settings.canDrawOverlays()  Protection level: signature
name: android.permission.SYSTEM_ALERT_WINDOW

description: Allows use of PendingIntent.getIntent().
name: android.permission.GET_INTENT_SENDER_INTENT

description: Allows an application to retrieve a package's importance.  This permission is not available to third party applications.
name: android.permission.GET_PACKAGE_IMPORTANCE

description: Allows an application to query process states and current OOM adjustment scores.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.GET_PROCESS_STATE_AND_OOM_SCORE

description: Allows an application to call killBackgroundProcesses.  Protection level: normal
name: android.permission.KILL_BACKGROUND_PROCESSES

description: The restartPackage API is no longer supported.
name: android.permission.RESTART_PACKAGES

description: Allows an application to start any activity, regardless of permission protection or exported state.
name: android.permission.START_ANY_ACTIVITY

description: Allows an application to create/manage/remove stacks
name: android.permission.MANAGE_ACTIVITY_STACKS

description: Allows an application to change to remove/kill tasks
name: android.permission.REMOVE_TASKS

description: Allows an application to change the Z-order of tasks.  Protection level: normal
name: android.permission.REORDER_TASKS

description: Allows an application to get full detailed information about recently running tasks, with full fidelity to the real state.
name: android.permission.GET_DETAILED_TASKS

description: Allows an application to set the profile owners and the device owner.  This permission is not available to third party applications.
name: android.permission.MANAGE_PROFILE_AND_DEVICE_OWNERS

description: Allows an application to create, remove users and get the list of users on the device. Applications holding this permission can only create restricted, guest, managed, demo, and ephemeral users. For creating other kind of users, MANAGE_USERS is needed.  This permission is not available to third party applications.
name: android.permission.CREATE_USERS

description: Allows an application to call APIs that allow it to query and manage users on the device. This permission is not available to third party applications.
name: android.permission.MANAGE_USERS

description: Fuller form of INTERACT_ACROSS_USERS that removes restrictions on where broadcasts can be sent and allows other types of interactions
name: android.permission.INTERACT_ACROSS_USERS_FULL

description: Allows an application to call APIs that allow it to do interactions across the users on the device, using singleton services and user-targeted broadcasts.  This permission is not available to third party applications.
name: android.permission.INTERACT_ACROSS_USERS

description: Allows an application to start a task from a ActivityManager#RecentTaskInfo.
name: android.permission.START_TASKS_FROM_RECENTS

description: New version of GET_TASKS that apps can request, since GET_TASKS doesn't really give access to task information.  We need this new one because there are many existing apps that use add libraries and such that have validation code to ensure the app has requested the GET_TASKS permission by seeing if it has been granted the permission...  if it hasn't, it kills the app with a message about being upset.  So we need to have it continue to look like the app is getting that permission, even though it will never be checked, and new privileged apps can now request this one for real access.
name: android.permission.REAL_GET_TASKS

description: No longer enforced.
name: android.permission.GET_TASKS

description: Allows applications to disable the keyguard if it is not secure.  Protection level: normal
name: android.permission.DISABLE_KEYGUARD

description: Allows an application to cache content.  Not for use by third-party applications.  Protection level: signature
name: android.permission.CACHE_CONTENT

description: Allows an application to manage access to documents, usually as part of a document picker.  This permission should only be requested by the platform document management app.  This permission cannot be granted to third-party apps.  Protection level: signature
name: android.permission.MANAGE_DOCUMENTS

description: Allows an application to write to internal media storage
name: android.permission.WRITE_MEDIA_STORAGE

description: Allows an application to receive STK related commands.
name: android.permission.RECEIVE_STK_COMMANDS

description: Allows an application to control the in-call experience.
name: android.permission.CONTROL_INCALL_EXPERIENCE

description: Must be required by a android.telecom.ConnectionServic, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.  Protection level: signature privileged
name: android.permission.BIND_TELECOM_CONNECTION_SERVICE

description: Must be required by a android.telecom.ConnectionServic, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.  android.telecom.ConnectionService should require android.permission.BIND_TELECOM_CONNECTION_SERVICE instead.
name: android.permission.BIND_CONNECTION_SERVICE

description: Must be required by a android.telecom.CallScreeningServic, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.  Protection level: signature privileged
name: android.permission.BIND_SCREENING_SERVICE

description: Must be required by a android.telecom.InCallServic, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.  Protection level: signature privileged
name: android.permission.BIND_INCALL_SERVICE

description: Protects the ability to register any PhoneAccount with PhoneAccount#CAPABILITY_CONNECTION_MANAGER
name: android.permission.REGISTER_CONNECTION_MANAGER

description: Protects the ability to register any PhoneAccount with PhoneAccount#CAPABILITY_CALL_PROVIDER.
name: android.permission.REGISTER_CALL_PROVIDER

description: Protects the ability to register any PhoneAccount with PhoneAccount#CAPABILITY_SIM_SUBSCRIPTION. This capability indicates that the PhoneAccount corresponds to a device SIM.
name: android.permission.REGISTER_SIM_SUBSCRIPTION

description: Allows read access to privileged phone state.  Used internally.
name: android.permission.READ_PRIVILEGED_PHONE_STATE

description: Allows read only access to precise phone state.  Pending API council approval
name: android.permission.READ_PRECISE_PHONE_STATE

description: Allows modification of the telephony state - power on, mmi, etc.  Does not include placing calls.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.MODIFY_PHONE_STATE

description: Allows sending the camera service notifications about system-wide events.
name: android.permission.CAMERA_SEND_SYSTEM_EVENTS

description: Allows disabling the transmit-indicator LED that is normally on when a camera is in use by an application.
name: android.permission.CAMERA_DISABLE_TRANSMIT_LED

description: Allows system update service to notify device owner about pending updates.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.NOTIFY_PENDING_SYSTEM_UPDATE

description: Allows querying state of PersistentDataBlock Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.ACCESS_PDB_STATE

description: Allows enabling/disabling OEM unlock Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.OEM_UNLOCK_STATE

description: Allows reading the OEM unlock state Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.READ_OEM_UNLOCK_STATE

description: Allows TvInputService to access DVB device.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.DVB_DEVICE

description: Allows to capture a frame of TV input hardware such as built-in tuners and HDMI-in's.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.CAPTURE_TV_INPUT

description: Allows TvInputService to access underlying TV input hardware such as built-in tuners and HDMI-in's.  This should only be used by OEM's TvInputService's.
name: android.permission.TV_INPUT_HARDWARE

description: Allows registration for remote audio playback.
name: android.permission.REMOTE_AUDIO_PLAYBACK

description: Allows access to configure network interfaces, configure/use IPSec, etc.
name: android.permission.NET_ADMIN

description: Allows access to FM This is not a third-party API (intended for system apps).
name: android.permission.ACCESS_FM_RADIO

description: Allows access to hardware peripherals.  Intended only for hardware testing.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.HARDWARE_TEST

description: Allows an application to access the MTP USB kernel driver.  For use only by the device side MTP implementation.
name: android.permission.ACCESS_MTP

description: Allows an application to manage preferences and permissions for USB devices
name: android.permission.MANAGE_USB

description: Allows an application to modify global audio settings.  Protection level: normal
name: android.permission.MODIFY_AUDIO_SETTINGS

description: Allows using the device's IR transmitter, if available.  Protection level: normal
name: android.permission.TRANSMIT_IR

description: Allows using PowerManager WakeLocks to keep processor from sleeping or screen from dimming.  Protection level: normal
name: android.permission.WAKE_LOCK

description: Allows access to the vibrator.  Protection level: normal
name: android.permission.VIBRATE

description: Allows applications to enter Wi-Fi Multicast mode.  Protection level: normal
name: android.permission.CHANGE_WIFI_MULTICAST_STATE

description: Allows applications to call into AccountAuthenticators.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.ACCOUNT_MANAGER

description: Allows access to the list of accounts in the Accounts Service.  Note: Beginning with Android 6.0 (API level 23), if an app shares the signature of the authenticator that manages an account, it does not need 'GET_ACCOUNTS' permission to read information about that account. On Android 5.1 and lower, all apps need 'GET_ACCOUNTS' permission to read information about any account. Protection level: dangerous
name: android.permission.GET_ACCOUNTS

description: Allows sending and receiving handover transfer status from Wifi and Bluetooth
name: android.permission.NFC_HANDOVER_STATUS

description: Allows access to the loop radio (Android mesh network) device.
name: android.permission.LOOP_RADIO

description: Allows a system application to access hardware packet offload capabilities.
name: android.permission.PACKET_KEEPALIVE_OFFLOAD

description: Allows an internal user to use restricted Networks.
name: android.permission.CONNECTIVITY_USE_RESTRICTED_NETWORKS

description: Allows an internal user to use privileged ConnectivityManager APIs.
name: android.permission.CONNECTIVITY_INTERNAL

description: Allows applications to perform I/O operations over NFC.  Protection level: normal
name: android.permission.NFC

description: Allows bluetooth stack to access files This should only be used by Bluetooth apk.
name: android.permission.BLUETOOTH_STACK

description: Control access to email providers exclusively for Bluetooth
name: android.permission.BLUETOOTH_MAP

description: Allows applications to pair bluetooth devices without user interaction, and to allow or disallow phonebook access or message access.  This is not available to third party applications.
name: android.permission.BLUETOOTH_PRIVILEGED

description: Allows applications to discover and pair bluetooth devices.  Protection level: normal
name: android.permission.BLUETOOTH_ADMIN

name: android.permission.BLUETOOTH

description: Allows applications to act as network scorers.

description: Allows an application to modify any wifi configuration, even if created by another application. Once reconfigured the original creator cannot make any further modifications.  Not for use by third-party applications.

description: Allow system apps to receive broadcast when a wifi network credential is changed.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.RECEIVE_WIFI_CREDENTIAL_CHANGE

description: Allows applications to change tether state and run tether carrier provisioning.  Not for use by third-party applications.

name: android.permission.CHANGE_WIFI_STATE

description: Allows applications to access information about Wi-Fi networks.  Protection level: normal
name: android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE

description: Allows applications to access information about networks.  Protection level: normal
name: android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE

description: Allows applications to open network sockets.  Protection level: normal
name: android.permission.INTERNET

description: Allows an application to create mock location providers for testing.  Protection level: signature
name: android.permission.ACCESS_MOCK_LOCATION

description: Allows an application to use location features in hardware, such as the geofencing api.  Not for use by third-party applications.

description: Allows HDMI-CEC service to access device and configuration files.  This should only be used by HDMI-CEC service.
name: android.permission.HDMI_CEC

description: Allows an application to install a location provider into the Location Manager.  Not for use by third-party applications.
name: android.permission.INSTALL_LOCATION_PROVIDER

description: Allows an application to access extra location provider commands.  Protection level: normal
name: android.permission.ACCESS_LOCATION_EXTRA_COMMANDS

name: com.android.voicemail.permission.READ_VOICEMAIL

description: Required to be able to access the camera device.  This will automatically enforce the '>  manifest element for all camera features.  If you do not require all camera features or can properly operate if a camera is not available, then you must modify your manifest as appropriate in order to install on devices that don't support all camera features. Protection level: dangerous
name: android.permission.CAMERA

description: Allows an application to Access UCE-OPTIONS.  Protection level: dangerous
name: android.permission.ACCESS_UCE_OPTIONS_SERVICE

description: Allows an application to Access UCE-Presence.  Protection level: dangerous
name: android.permission.ACCESS_UCE_PRESENCE_SERVICE

name: android.permission.RECORD_AUDIO

description: Allows an application to see the number being dialed during an outgoing call with the option to redirect the call to a different number or abort the call altogether.  Protection level: dangerous
name: android.permission.PROCESS_OUTGOING_CALLS

description: Allows an application to use SIP service.  Protection level: dangerous
name: android.permission.USE_SIP

description: Allows an application to add voicemails into the system.  Protection level: dangerous
name: com.android.voicemail.permission.ADD_VOICEMAIL

description: Allows an application to write (but not read) the user's call log data.  Note: If your app uses the WRITE_CONTACTS permission and both your ' minSdkVersion and ' targetSdkVersion values are set to 15 or lower, the system implicitly grants your app this permission. If you don't need this permission, be sure your ' targetSdkVersion is 16 or higher. Protection level: dangerous
name: android.permission.WRITE_CALL_LOG

description: Allows an application to read the user's call log.  Note: If your app uses the READ_CONTACTS permission and both your ' minSdkVersion and ' targetSdkVersion values are set to 15 or lower, the system implicitly grants your app this permission. If you don't need this permission, be sure your ' targetSdkVersion is 16 or higher. Protection level: dangerous
name: android.permission.READ_CALL_LOG

description: Allows an application to access the IMS call service: making and modifying a call Protection level: signature privileged
name: android.permission.ACCESS_IMS_CALL_SERVICE

description: Allows an application to initiate a phone call without going through the Dialer user interface for the user to confirm the call.  Protection level: dangerous
name: android.permission.CALL_PHONE

description: Allows read only access to phone state, including the phone number of the device, current cellular network information, the status of any ongoing calls, and a list of any android.telecom.PhoneAccount registered on the device.  Note: If both your ' minSdkVersion and ' targetSdkVersion values are set to 3 or lower, the system implicitly grants your app this permission. If you don't need this permission, be sure your ' targetSdkVersion is 4 or higher.  Protection level: dangerous
name: android.permission.READ_PHONE_STATE

description: Allows an app to access approximate location.  Protection level: dangerous
name: android.permission.ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION

description: Allows an app to access precise location.  Protection level: dangerous
name: android.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION

description: Allows an application to write to external storage.  Note: If both your ' minSdkVersion and ' targetSdkVersion values are set to 3 or lower, the system implicitly grants your app this permission. If you don't need this permission, be sure your '>getExternalFilesDir and getExternalCacheDir.  Protection level: dangerous
name: android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE

description: Allows an application to read from external storage.  Any app that declares the WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE permission is implicitly granted this permission. This permission is enforced starting in API level 19.  Before API level 19, this permission is not enforced and all apps still have access to read from external storage.  You can test your app with the permission enforced by enabling Protect USB storage under Developer options in the Settings app on a device running Android 4.1 or higher. Also starting in API level 19, this permission is not required to read/write files in your application-specific directories returned by getExternalFilesDir and getExternalCacheDir.  Note: If both your ' minSdkVersion and ' targetSdkVersion values are set to 3 or lower, the system implicitly grants your app this permission. If you don't need this permission, be sure your ' targetSdkVersion is 4 or higher.  Protection level: dangerous
name: android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE

description: Allows an application to read previously received cell broadcast messages and to register a content observer to get notifications when a cell broadcast has been received and added to the database. For emergency alerts, the database is updated immediately after the alert dialog and notification sound/vibration/speech are presented.  The 'read' column is then updated after the user dismisses the alert.  This enables supplementary emergency assistance apps to start loading additional emergency information (if Internet access is available) when the alert is first received, and to delay presenting the info to the user until after the initial alert dialog is dismissed.  Protection level: dangerous Pending API council approval
name: android.permission.READ_CELL_BROADCASTS

name: android.permission.RECEIVE_MMS

description: Allows an application to receive WAP push messages.  Protection level: dangerous
name: android.permission.RECEIVE_WAP_PUSH

description: Allows an application to read SMS messages.  Protection level: dangerous
name: android.permission.READ_SMS

name: android.permission.RECEIVE_SMS

description: Allows an application to send SMS messages.  Protection level: dangerous
name: android.permission.SEND_SMS

name: android.permission.WRITE_CALENDAR

name: android.permission.READ_CALENDAR
